summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Municipal Code, amending Title 10 by adding a new Chapter 10.09 thereto to define a public nuisance, as permitted by RCW 35.22.280 (30) which gives any City of the first class the power to declare what shall be a public nuisance, and to abate the same, and to impose fines upon parties who may create, continue, or suffer public nuisances to exist, and prescribing remedies therefor.
